Key Match Events: Olmo (51') and Merino (119') scored for Spain
Le Normand (29'), Torres (74'), Simon (82'), Carvajal (100'), Rodri (110'), Ruiz (120') scored for Germany
Pre-Game Insights: Toni Kroos praises Rodri and Lamine Yamal ahead of quarter-final
Rodri and Yamal are standout performers for Spain
Post-Match Reflections: Toni Kroos praises Germany's performance despite losing
Rodri and Yamal's performance was key to Spain's win
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match went to extra time, with Spain winning 2-1
This was Spain's first loss in the tournament
Others: Spain's next match will be against either Portugal or France in the semi-finals
